title: Rohit Sharma:Rohit Sharma Oozes Class & Elegance As He Hits Second Hundred In The First Test Vs South Africa
text:
Rohit Sharma Oozes Class & Elegance On Way To His Second Hundred In The First Test Vs South Africa

Rohit Sharma Oozes Class & Elegance On Way To His Second Hundred In The First Test Vs South Africa

Rohit Sharma has given a terrific account of his huge temperament after smashing his second hundred in the ongoing first Test against South Africa.

BCCI

After a terrific 176 in the first innings, which also included a 317 run stand for the first wicket with Mayank Agarwal, it looked like Rohit wasn't satisfied with one hundred. He started in fine fashion in the second innings - playing with intent and oozing class that he is.

After India bowled out South Africa for 431 to take a first innings lead of 71, India needed a good start to build on the lead but lost Mayank Agarwal early. That didn't have any impact on Rohit, who smashed it all around the ground to bring up his fifth Test hundred.

BCCI

Don't Miss 212 SHARES 164 SHARES 452 SHARES

There were all kinds of questions marks on Rohit Sharma suitability to open the innings in the longest format for India, but after two hundreds in the same match, the doubts have been dispatched with supreme authority.

Having been a top performer in the limited overs cricket, Rohit hasn't quite got going in the Test cricket, to the surprise of many. With talent and potential aplenty, Rohit Sharma has not set the stage alight in the five-day format.

But after being promoted to the opening slot in the first Test against South Africa, he has produce the goods with twin hundreds - 176 in the first innings and followed it up with a brilliant 127.

It might well be the Test that has seen the arrival of real Rohit Sharma - the one that has been smashing it in the limited over formats.
